pages.text: Thumma 'Inna Rabbaka Lilladhina `Amilu As-Su'a Bijahalatin Thumma Tabu Min Ba`di Dhalika Wa 'Aslahu 'Inna Rabbaka Min Ba`diha Laghafurun Rahimun
Inna 'Ibrahima Kana 'Ummatan Qanitaan Lillahi Hanifaan Wa Lam Yaku Mina Al-Mushrikina
Shakiraan Li'n`umihi Ajtabahu Wa Hadahu 'Ila Siratin Mustaqim
Wa 'Ataynahu Fi Ad-Dunya Hasanatan Wa 'Innahu Fi Al-'Akhirati Lamina As-Salihina
Thumma 'Awhayna 'Ilayka 'Ani Attabi` Millata 'Ibrahima Hanifaan Wa Ma Kana Mina Al-Mushrikina
Innama Ju`ila As-Sabtu `Ala Al-Ladhina Akhtalafu Fihi Wa 'Inna Rabbaka Layahkumu Baynahum Yawma Al-Qiyamati Fima Kanu Fihi Yakhtalifuna
Ad`u 'Ila Sabili Rabbika Bil-Hikmati Wa Al-Maw`izati Al-Hasanati Wa Jadilhum Bi-Ati Hiya 'Ahsanu 'Inna Rabbaka Huwa 'A`lamu Biman Đalla `An Sabilihi Wa Huwa 'A`lamu Bil-Muhtadina
Wa 'In `Aqabtum Fa`aqibu Bimithli Ma `Uqibtum Bihi Wa La'in Sabartum Lahuwa Khayrun Lilssabirina
Wa Asbir Wa Ma Sabruka 'Illa Billahi Wa La Tahzan `Alayhim Wa La Taku Fi Đayqin Mimma Yamkuruna
Inna Allaha Ma`a Al-Ladhina Attaqaw Wa Al-Ladhina Hum Muhsinuna
